na fi w’ebusua mu: na mama wo dzin ayɛ kɛse: na ayɛ nhyira:"

Fi wo man mu: na nyia ɔdom wo no mobɔdom no: na wo mu na wobehyira asaase ebusua ebusua nyinara."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Nna Abram kɔr dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ no no: na Lot nye no kɔree: na Abram fii Haran no nna oedzi mfe eduosuon enum."

na fi w’ebusua mu: na hɔn ahodze a wonyaa nyinara
na fi w’egya fie: na nyimpa a wonyaa no wɔ Haran no nyinara; na wosii mu dɛ wɔrokɔ Keenan asaase do; na Keenan asaase do na wɔbae."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na Abram twaa mu wɔ asaase no do kɔr beebi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Sekem
Fi wo man mu: kɔr More esudur no ho. Na aber no nna Keenanfo wɔ asaase no do."

na fi w’ebusua mu: W’asefo na medze asaase yi bɛma hɔn: na hɔ na Abram sii afɔrmbukyia maa EWURADZE a oyii noho kyerɛɛ no no."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na ofii hɔ kɔr bepɔw a ɔwɔ Bɛtɛl no boka no do
na fi w’egya fie: na Ai dzi no boka: na osii afɔrmbukyia maa EWURADZE wɔ hɔ na ɔsɔɔr EWURADZE dzin."

Fi wo man mu: dɛ ɔda ho ara rokɔ Pomu afamu."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na ɔkɔm baa asaase no do: na Abram kɔr Egypt kɛtsenaa hɔ ahɔhotsena; osiandɛ ɔkɔm no yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase no do."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ aka kakra ma ɔahɛn Egypt no
na fi w’ebusua mu: Minyim dɛ eyɛ ɔbaa a wo ho yɛ fɛw:"

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ Egyptfo no hu wo a
na fi w’ebusua mu: Ne yer nye yi: na woboku emi
m’akyerɛbaa nye wo: ama osian ɔwo ntsi eesi yie ama me
na fi w’egya fie: na osian ɔwo ntsi me kra aatsena ase."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Abram baa Egypt no
Fi wo man mu: Egyptfo no hun ɔbaa no dɛ no ho yɛ fɛw papa."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na Farao ne mbapɔmba no hun no
Fi wo man mu: na wɔbɛkamfoo no kyerɛɛ Farao: na wɔbɛfaa ɔbaa no kɔr Farao fie."

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na ɔyɛɛ Abram yie wɔ ne ntsi: na onyaa nguan
"Na osian Abram yer Sarai ntsi EWURADZE dze ɔyardɔm akɛse haaw Farao nye ne fi."

na fi w’ebusua mu: Ebɛnadze na edze ayɛ me yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na annka annkyerɛ me dɛ wo yer a?"

Fi wo man mu: M’akyerɛbaa a ma dɛm ntsi mefaa no nkyɛ morowar no yi? Dɛm ntsi afei

"Afei EWURADZE see Abram dɛ: "Na Farao hyɛɛ nkorɔfo ma wokegyaa ɔno
na fi w’ebusua mu: nye dza ɔwɔ nyinara wɔ ɔkwan do."
